channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Operationalizing Microsoft Security Copilot to Reinvent SOC Productivity
item.description: In a Security Operations Center (SOC), time to resolve and mitigate both alerts and incidents are of the highest importance. This time can mean the difference between controlled risk and impact, and large risk and impact. While our core products detect and respond at machine speed, our ongoing mission is to upskill SOC analysts and empower them to be more efficient where they’re needed to engage. To bridge this gap, we are bringing Security Copilot into our industry-leading XDR platform, Microsoft 365 Defender, which is like adding the ultimate expert SOC analyst to your team, both raising the...
